name: Red Nose Guy Suika
description:
Red Nose Guy Suika

Red Nose Guy Suika is the ultimate version of the Suika Games series, born from the innovative fusion of Tetris and 2048 elements. In this casual game adventure, players embark on a delightful journey of strategic ball-shooting fun.

Gameplay Features:
  • Drop and Merge: Experience a unique blend of Tetris and 2048 mechanics as you strategically shoot balls, merging them to create larger ones.
  • Point Scoring: Each successful merge earns you points. Aim for the highest score by creating larger balls and mastering the fusion strategy.
  • Leaderboard Competition: Challenge yourself and compete against friends and players worldwide with the integrated leaderboard system.
  • Multiple Input Options: Play the way you want! Use a controller, keyboard, or mouse to control ball movement and unleash shots at the perfect moment.

How to Play:
  • Fusion Challenge: Merge balls to create larger ones, aiming for the highest score before the game ends.
  • Limit Break: Watch out for the upper limit of the rectangular play area – if a ball surpasses it, the game is over.
  • Versatile Controls: Easily navigate the game by moving the ball left or right and clicking to shoot, whether you prefer a controller, keyboard, or mouse.

Game Modes:
  • Classic Mode: Drop & merge balls with no pressure from time or space !
  • Score+: Focus on combo and get a chance to remove a ball from the game zone.
  • Limbo: The limit goes down while playing. Hurry up and merge balls to get it higher !
  • Compactor: Watch out ! The walls are moving young Jedi. Merge balls and push the walls back.
  • AutoDrop: The trigger is jammed, the balls fall down whatever you do. The more balls are on the game, the faster it falls !

Customize:
  • Change the balls' faces among the 10 sets available.
  • Select the interface skin from a list of 20 skins.
  • Change the in-game music for the one you like the most out of a list of 10.
  • Have more fun with special Sound FX item from the 5 packs available.
  • Customize your game with more than 50 Stickers but you can't buy the Golden Ball. You can only earn it by merging two green balls !

Compete and Share:
  • Leaderboard: Save your best scores and compare them with other players worldwide.
  • Accessible Controls: Play with ease using your preferred control method – controller, keyboard, or mouse.
  • Endless Fun: Engage in casual gaming sessions, perfect for quick play or longer strategic sessions.

Boosters & purchases:
  • Every 15.000 points cumulated, you win a booster.
  • Each booster contains an customized item such as Sound FX, Music, Game Skin, Balls Skin, or Sticker.
  • You can also buy N-Coins on Steam to directly purchase each available item.
  • The game comes with the Classic Pack (Classic Game Mode, Classic Balls Skin, Classic Music, Classic Sound FX and one sticker).

Get ready for a fusion of fun and strategy in Red Nose Guy Suika!
